name: Rockman DASH: 5tsu no Shima no Daibouken!
storyline: The adventure is set between Mega Man Legends and Mega Man Legends 2 on the timeline. MegaMan and Roll explore the islands in search of treasures and naturally the Bonnes are always around to stir up trouble!
summary: Rockman DASH: 5tsu no Shima no Daibouken! (ロックマンDASH 5つの島の大冒険! Rokkuman DASH Itsutsu no Shima no Daibouken!, roughly "Rockman DASH: Great Adventure on 5 Islands!") is a video game in the Rockman DASH series released in 2008 for mobile phones via the i-mode Internet service. The game has a total of five islands, each with seven areas to explore. Rock Volnutt and friends explore them in search of treasure and to uncover their secrets.
